original_title: 脱獄者 市来まひろ
overview: While the news of Akutsu, an escaped prisoner whose whereabouts are still unknown, was being reported day after day, the person himself lived from day to day as a visiting home appliance repairman. One day, while Akutsu was repairing a TV at the Mahiro couple's house, he was unlucky enough to see a wanted photo of himself on the TV. Mahiro realizes who she really is...
title: Escaped Prisoner – Mahiro Ichiki
